name: Demon Sea
description:
Demon Sea is a naval shooting game with a twist: you can dive! Set sails on a mysterious sea ruled by the demon who enslaved you. Switch from the fight in the world of the living to the hunt in the world of the spirits to find the soul of your mother and reunite your family.

Features:

  • Navigate in a stylized world inspired by 18th century engraving.
  • Fight against powerful ships trying to strike you down.
  • Follow the story of a man haunted by the death of his father and manipulated by a powerful demon, trying to find the soul of his mother.
  • Flip you ship to dive into the world of the spirits.
